content: stitch pattern 45 on page 60 of vogue knitting stitchionary vol 4 crochet *lion brand stitchfinder crochet stitch alone together* stitch directions reproduced with permission from vogue knitting stitchionary volume four sixth & spring books 2007 motif 3 rounds joining directions provided *possible error found by member * found an error in the written directions as taken from the stitch section of lion brand s website simply follow the charted directions ignore the written
